thread.title: BRIEF-Rite Aid Commences Offer To Purchase Certain Of Its Outstanding Series Of Notes

title: BRIEF-Rite Aid Commences Offer To Purchase Certain Of Its Outstanding Series Of Notes
text:
Feb 27 (Reuters) - Rite Aid Corp:
* RITE AID COMMENCES OFFER TO PURCHASE CERTAIN OF ITS OUTSTANDING SERIES OF NOTES
* RITE AID CORP - ‍COMMENCED OFFER TO PURCHASE FOR CASH UP TO $900 MILLION OF OUTSTANDING 9.25% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2020​
* RITE AID CORP - ‍ALSO OFFER TO PURCHASE CERTAIN OF OUTSTANDING SERIES OF NOTES ​‍6.75% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2021 AND 6.125% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2023​‍​
* RITE AID CORP - ‍ASSET SALE OFFER WILL EXPIRE AT 5:00 P.M., EASTERN TIME, ON MARCH 29, 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
